text: Aurimas Kieža (born October 25, 1982) is a Lithuanian professional basketball player for BC Sūduva. ==Professional career== On April 14, 2011, Kieža was named the Lithuanian Basketball League's regular season MVP, after averaging 15.7 points, 10.5 rebounds, 2.6 assists, and 1.3 blocks (with an efficiency rating of 22.0) per game.Kieža – naudingiausias LKL reguliariojo sezono krepšininkas . == References == == External links == * Eurobasket.com Profile * FIBA.com Profile Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:BC Pieno žvaigždės players Category:Hofstra Pride men's basketball players Category:KB Prishtina players Category:Lithuanian men's basketball players Category:Pallacanestro Reggiana players Category:Sportspeople from Kaunas Category:Power forwards (basketball)
title: Aurimas Kieža
